body:
My first post was a bit of a joke (so funny i know ritee im da best) bu this one is a bit more serious. So when I first saw the the new AV avicus logo, I thought the little The Avicus network thing on the side was a visualizer.  It's not of course, but I didn't let that stop me.  I couldn't get it work in white, but here it is, me own Avicus Visualizer. Thanks :3

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uhIB3Z9bpeI&feature=youtu.be

title: Avisualizer
